abstract: The Hunt column on search by young professional couple for a new-construction condominium apartment in New York City; found two-bedroom unit at Two Northside Piers complex in Williamsburg, Brooklyn, for $929,000.
snippet: Marisa and Rich Fuller, Upper East Side renters, thought they wanted a house in the suburbs but wound up in a new two-bedroom condo in Williamsburg, Brooklyn.
lead_paragraph: Marisa and Rich Fuller, Upper East Side renters, thought they wanted a house in the suburbs but wound up in a new two-bedroom condo in Williamsburg, Brooklyn.

headline.seo: The Hunt: A High-Rise Change of Plans
